DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study determine difference pain level follow use low level laser therapy versus placebo control placement elastomeric orthodontic separator pediatric patient . To test , investigator assess patient 's pain level immediately follow separator placement 24 hour post-operatively patient rate pain 10 cm Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) . Patients randomly assign one three group : treatment , placebo , control . The aim study establish whether low level laser therapy use reduce pain pediatric patient follow separator placement .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Low Level Laser Therapy Pain Induced Placement Orthodontic Separators Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: Absence acute chronic dental disease periodontal disease Free severe systemic disease No fix orthodontic appliance currently place No ankylosis tooth implant within dentition No analgesic drug consumption 48 hour precede study study , minimum age 6 year Presence diastema separator would place Conditions could alter nociception , current previous use antiinflammatory analgesic drug , antidepressant , anticonvulsant , oral contraceptive Any medical condition medication may contraindicate use certain light/laser source low level laser therapy ( LLLT )
